name: Akamidori [MID]
description:
An Arcade Runner with a colored twist 

Made for the 2021 Mid Jam

If you are on windows please download the EXE for a better experience

CONTROLS

Z = Change to Red

X = Change to Blue

C = Change to Yellow

V = Change to Green

OTHER INFO

Game made by me UrBoiRAD

Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev

Fun fact Akamidori means Red-Green in Japanese (according to google translate)
